channel.title: How do I add a button to the bank? [317]
channel.description: Hey i would like to add like the deposit all in bank button in runescape to my RSPS, it is a 317 and it is delta based. Any help would be very apperciated.

item.title: How do I add a button to the bank? [317]
item.dc:creator: @gamedevil gamedevil
item.description:
@gamedevil wrote:

oh, well nothing showed up for me… can you explain to me how to use it?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add a button to the bank? [317]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“gamedevil, post:3, topic:331881”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=428263.msg3144439#msg3144439 date=1267926873]
I believe you want this post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427639.0.html
[/quote]

Not really… that wasn’t useful at all for me. I need to know how to add a button to bank that will let the players deposit all the items in their inventory quickly…[/quote]

you cant add a button unless its client sided, which is exactly what (krackkid posted) what you need.

Read full topic
